pageProduct.name: Organic Care Kids 3in1 Shampoo Conditioner Body Wash Popcorn 400ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

OC Kids 3 in 1 Conditioning Shampoo & Body Wash Popcorn - Feel happy & fresh with Sunflower Oil & Shea Butter, leaving your little one squeaky clean & soft.

Plant derived ingredients.
Naturally kind 3 in 1.

No petrochemical cleansers, sles, als or parabens.

Product Claims: Not tested on animals

Size: 400mL

Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes. If eye contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with water. If rash or irritation occurs, discontinue use. For external use only.

Ingredients

Water, Coco-Glucoside*, Sodium '„oco-Sulfate*, Glycerin*, Glyceryl Oleate*, Lauryl Lactyl Lactate*, Polyquatemium-10*, Triticum Vulgare (Wheat) Germ Oil*, Panthenol, Organic Helianthus Annuus ,Sunflower) Seed Oil*, Organic Butyrospermum Parkii iShea) Butter*, Citric Acid*, Fragrance, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate. * Piant Derived.

Directions

Apply to wet hair, form a gentle lather then rinse. Apply to a moist puff or wash cloth & gently lather all aver body then rinse.

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Bottle made from 100% recycled pet. Bottle. Cap. arl.org.au

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
